Pythonista UI Games
===================

Some beginner games I made with the UI module in Pythonista. Most are WIP.


### rps.py

A rock, paper, scissors game. 

### guessing.py

A basic guessing game. _Hint: Guess 499 each time to get the best possible outcome ;)_

### TicTacToe.py

A tic tac toe game.
